index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year commencing July 7, 1975 through July 6, 1976; accepting supplemental financial assistance (Urgent Needs Discretionary Fund) from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing implementation of certain projects by the Executive Department - Office of Policy Planning, Department of Parks and Recreation, Public Health Department, and the Department of Human Resources; authorizing certain interdepartmental and other agreements in connection therewith; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
